item.title: Amundi 表示客户要求在高波动性环境中进行套期保值
item.description: Amundi SA 表示，在今年一系列事件加剧波动之后，欧洲最大资产管理公司的机构客户正越来越多地寻求自我保护。【原文：Amundi SA said institutional clients at Europe’s largest asset manager are increasingly looking to protect themselves after a series of events this year boosted volatility.】

item.title: 消费者削减娱乐消费，美国 GDP 下调
item.description: 由于娱乐服务支出急剧下降，美国第一季度消费支出的增长速度为疫情爆发以来最弱。【原文：US consumer spending grew in the first quarter at the weakest pace since the onset of the pandemic as outlays for recreation services plunged.】

item.title: 2025 年美国 IPO 股票跃升逾 50%，释放风险偏好信号
item.description: 尽管对地缘政治和唐纳德-特朗普总统关税的担忧笼罩着市场，但美国首次公开募股（IPO）的飙升回报率使人们对今年晚些时候乃至2026年的IPO活动回暖产生了新的乐观情绪。【原文：Roaring returns for US IPOs are driving fresh optimism that activity will pick up steam later this year and into 2026, even as worries over geopolitics and President Donald Trump’s tariffs hang over the market.】

item.title: 人工智能公司业绩飙升 300% 后，CoreWeave 首席执行官跻身全球富豪榜
item.description: 在不温不火的公开募股几乎泡汤的三个月后，CoreWeave 公司的股价大涨，使其首席执行官跻身世界 500 强富豪行列，并使其他五位长期支持者的股份达到数十亿美元。【原文：Three months after a tepid public offering that almost didn’t happen, a surge in CoreWeave Inc.’s stock has vaulted its chief executive officer into the ranks of the world’s 500 richest people — and lifted five other longtime backers’ stakes into the billions.】

item.title: 加密货币平台 Kraken 计划推出与区块链现金应用 Venmo 竞争的产品
item.description: 加密货币交易所 Kraken 正在开发一款以汇款和支付为目标的金融服务应用程序，从而在可能的股票上市前进一步丰富公司的收入来源。【原文：Crypto exchange Kraken is developing a financial services app targeting remittances and payments, further diversifying the company’s revenue streams ahead of a potential stock market debut.】

item.title: 首席执行官表示，H&M 必须在主要市场附近采购更多产品以抵御关税
item.description: 瑞典快速时尚零售商 Hennes & Mauritz AB 正在加快从距离其主要市场较近的制造商采购商品，因为美国的关税和地缘政治动荡使贸易变得更加复杂。【原文：Swedish fast-fashion retailer Hennes & Mauritz AB is speeding up efforts to source goods from manufacturers closer to its main markets as US tariffs and geopolitical turmoil complicate trade.】

item.title: 巴基斯坦希望在快速推进的谈判中尽快达成美国贸易协议
item.description: 巴基斯坦表示，与美国的贸易谈判可能在下周结束，因为巴基斯坦提出要在谈判进展异常迅速的情况下促进美国进口，尤其是棉花。【原文：Pakistan said trade talks with the US could wrap up next week, as it offers to boost American imports, particularly cotton, amid unusually fast-moving negotiations.】

item.title: 约旦航空公司在战乱地区躲避导弹继续飞行
item.description: 约旦地处中东最动荡的冲突地区之间，长期以来一直在学习如何应对军事冲突。对于约旦王国的国家航空公司来说，这意味着要研究导弹的飞行路线，以调整飞机的方向，有时只需片刻时间就能做出反应。【原文：Wedged between the Middle East’s most embattled conflict zones, Jordan has long learned to navigate military strife. For the kingdom’s national airline, that means studying missile flight paths to redirect its aircraft, sometimes with just moments to respond.】

item.title: 巴金称美联储应等待局势明朗后再调整利率
item.description: 里士满联邦储备银行行长汤姆-巴金（Tom Barkin）表示，他预计关税将给物价带来上行压力，由于仍有许多不确定因素，央行应等待更多的明确信息后再调整利率。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Richmond President Tom Barkin said he expects tariffs will put upward pressure on prices, and with so much still uncertain, the central bank should wait for more clarity before adjusting interest rates.】

item.title: 贝利称工党薪资税令英国抗击通胀形势复杂化
item.description: 英国央行行长安德鲁-贝利（Andrew Bailey）警告说，通货膨胀的风险仍然是 "双面的"，他说，工党政府的工资税正在使英国丧失就业机会、压低工人收入并推高食品价格。【原文：The Labour government’s payroll tax is costing the UK jobs, depressing workers’ earnings and pushing up food prices, Bank of England Governor Andrew Bailey said as he warned that the risks to inflation remain “two-sided.”】

item.title: 出口下降导致美国商品贸易逆差意外扩大
item.description: 5 月份，美国商品贸易逆差出人意料地扩大，出口出现了自大流行病爆发以来的最大降幅，而进口则变化不大。【原文：The US merchandise-trade deficit unexpectedly widened in May on the biggest drop in exports since the onset of the pandemic, while imports were little changed.】

item.title: 美国重复申请失业救济人数跃升至 2021 年 11 月以来新高
item.description: 美国失业救济金的经常性申请升至2021年11月以来的最高点，延续了过去一个半月的大幅增长，表明越来越多的人失业时间延长。【原文：Recurring applications for US unemployment benefits rose to the highest since November 2021, extending a sharp increase over the past 1 1/2 month and signaling more people are staying out of work for longer.】

item.title: 赞比亚法院支持赞比亚采矿和金属公司（ZCCM）对桑帕公司出售莫帕尼项目提出质疑
item.description: 赞比亚一家法院将国有铜矿公司与一名反对党议员提起的质疑出售莫帕尼铜矿公司（Mopani Copper Mines）的案件相提并论。【原文：A Zambian court adjoined the state-owned copper-mining company to a case brought by an opposition lawmaker challenging the sale of Mopani Copper Mines.】

item.title: 对冲基金麦哲伦资本办公室遭迪拜监管机构搜查
item.description: 迪拜金融监管机构上个月对 Magellan Capital 有限公司的办公室进行了搜查，因为一名前交易员投诉称，这家对冲基金初创公司的一名高管隐瞒了投资损失，并阻止员工揭示风险。【原文：Dubai’s financial regulator conducted a search last month at the offices of Magellan Capital Limited, following complaints from a former trader who claimed a senior executive at the hedge fund startup had concealed investment losses and prevented staff from flagging risks.】

item.title: Salesforce 首席执行官称 30% 的内部工作由人工智能处理
item.description: Salesforce Inc.首席执行官马克-贝尼奥夫（Marc Benioff）说，他的公司已经利用人工智能实现了大量工作的自动化，这是该公司鼓吹新兴技术具有替代劳动力潜力的又一个例子。【原文：Salesforce Inc. Chief Executive Officer Marc Benioff said his company has automated a significant chunk of work with AI, another example of a firm touting labor-replacing potential of the emerging technology.】

item.title: 俄罗斯银行担心债务危机将至，战争令经济捉襟见肘
item.description: 据俄罗斯银行业官员称，俄罗斯经济面临的恶化前景比公开承认的更为严重，在未来 12 个月内有可能爆发系统性银行危机。【原文：Russia’s economy faces a worsening outlook that is graver than publicly acknowledged, with a credible risk of a systemic banking crisis in the next 12 months, according to Russian banking officials.】

item.title: 壳牌收购谈判结束，英国石油公司重回埃利奥特视野
item.description:
首席执行官穆雷-奥金克斯（Murray Auchincloss）需要证明他正在兑现承诺，通过提高产量和卸载数十亿美元的资产来加强资产负债表。【原文：

CEO Murray Auchincloss needs to show he’s making good on promises to strengthen the balance sheet by driving up production and offloading billions of dollars in assets.

】

item.title: 鹰派政策制定者称印度仍有可能降息
item.description: 印度央行利率制定小组的一位相对鹰派的成员表示，尽管上一次政策立场的转变表明了紧缩的倾向，但借贷成本仍有下降的空间。【原文：A relatively hawkish member of the Indian central bank’s interest rate-setting panel said there is room for borrowing costs to come down, despite a shift in stance in the last policy indicating a tightening bias.】

item.title: 德国仿人机器人首次亮相失败
item.description: 欢迎收看《深度科技》（Tech In Depth），这是彭博社全球记者关于科技商业的每日通讯。今天，维雷娜-塞普（Verena Sepp）和马克-伯根（Mark Bergen）将从慕尼黑一场失败的机器人演示中发回消息。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Verena Sepp and Mark Bergen send a dispatch from a botched robotics demonstration in Munich.】

item.title: 花旗证券亚太区主管称中国不容忽视
item.description: 肯-格里芬（Ken Griffin）的做市巨头花旗集团证券公司（Citadel Securities LLC）亚太区主管维凯什-科特查（Vikesh Kotecha）说，作为一项全球性业务，花旗集团不能忽视中国。【原文：Citadel Securities LLC, Ken Griffin’s market-making giant, cannot ignore China as a global business, its Asia-Pacific head Vikesh Kotecha said.】

item.title: 美国遭受 "双重打击"，春季房地产市场一片萧条
item.description: 我是克里斯-安斯蒂，波士顿的经济编辑。今天我们将关注美国房地产市场的低迷状况。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net。如果您还没有注册，请点击这里。【原文：I’m Chris Anstey, an economics editor in Boston. Today we’re looking at the dour state of the US housing market. Send us feedback and tips to ecodaily@bloomberg.net. And if you aren’t yet signed up to receive this newsletter, you can do so here.】

item.title: 日本与美国的贸易谈判因汽车关税问题陷入僵局
item.description: 现在似乎是一个提醒的好时机，在贸易格斗俱乐部中，有几条规则。【原文：Now seems like a good time for a reminder that in trade fight club, there are a couple of rules.】

item.title: 蓝石支持的体育平台 Volo 收购竞争对手 ZogSports
item.description: Volo Sports 已达成收购 ZogSports 的协议，后者是仅次于 Volo 的第二大娱乐联赛组织平台。【原文：Volo Sports has reached an agreement to acquire ZogSports, the second-largest recreational league organizing platform after Volo.】

item.title: 做空者在欺诈报告发布前对 Worldline 下注
item.description: 在报道发表前几天，做空者提高了对 Worldline SA 公司债券和股票的押注，这家法国公司的市值因报道称该公司涉嫌掩盖其部分客户的欺诈行为而暴跌 5 亿欧元。【原文：Short sellers raised their wagers against the bonds and shares of Worldline SA, the French company whose market value slumped €500 million on reports that the firm allegedly covered up fraud by some of its customers, in the days before the stories were published.】

item.title: Jes Staley 因与爱泼斯坦的关系被禁赛，最终败诉
item.description: 前巴克莱银行（Barclays Plc）老板杰斯-斯塔利（Jes Staley）因与杰弗里-爱泼斯坦（Jeffrey Epstein）的关系而被城市监管机构禁入，他在推翻禁入令的法律诉讼中败诉，这几乎断送了他在英国金融服务业恢复名誉的努力。【原文：Former Barclays Plc boss Jes Staley lost a legal battle to overturn his ban from the City watchdog over his relationship with Jeffrey Epstein, all but ending his attempt to rehabilitate himself in the British financial services industry.】

item.title: 俄罗斯北极液化天然气 2 号附近数月来首次出现油轮
item.description: 一艘液化天然气油轮似乎正驶向被美国制裁的俄罗斯北极出口工厂，这可能是莫斯科为恢复闲置八个月之久的工厂运输所做的最新努力。【原文：A liquefied natural gas tanker appears to be heading to a Russian Arctic export plant sanctioned by the US, potentially Moscow’s latest efforts to revive shipments from a facility idled for eight months.】

item.title: 贸易战担忧消退，动物精神重回亚洲
item.description:
从股票、货币到信贷，四月市场动荡后的反弹令人印象深刻

。【原文：

From stocks to currencies to credit, the rebound from the depths of the April market turmoil has been impressive

】

item.title: 太阳能制造商 Meyer Burger 的美国子公司申请破产
item.description: Meyer Burger Technology AG 的美国业务已申请破产保护程序，目的是出售这家总部位于瑞士的太阳能制造商在美国的全部或大部分资产。【原文：Meyer Burger Technology AG’s US operations have filed for Chapter 11 proceedings with the aim of selling all or most of the Swiss-headquartered solar manufacturer’s assets in the country.】

item.title: 中国在美国紧张局势下试探性进口阿根廷豆粕
item.description: 中国罕见地从阿根廷预订了一批豆粕，因为在与美国的贸易战持续不断的情况下，中国正努力确保一种关键动物饲料原料的供应。【原文：China has booked a rare shipment of soybean meal from Argentina, as the country seeks to secure supplies of a key animal feed ingredient amid an ongoing trade war with the US.】

item.title: PayPal 支持的 Pine Labs 借助金融科技热潮提交印度 IPO 申请
item.description: 数字支付提供商 Pine Labs Ltd. 已在印度申请首次公开募股，政府的数字化推动促进了金融技术领域的蓬勃发展。【原文：Digital payments provider Pine Labs Ltd. filed for an initial public offering in India, as the government’s digitization push fuels a boom in the financial technology space.】
